artifacts.summary: Deep-dive analysis of all 4 sorries in DovetailingChain.lean, identifying cross-sign propagation and witness enumeration as orthogonal problems, with unified Zorn+Henkin solution

next_steps: Run /plan 870 to create implementation plan for the unified Zorn-based approach. The construction has 6 phases estimated at 16-22 hours.
